derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: named after Mrs Amelia J. Bloomer (1818–94), an American social reformer who advocated a similar garment

entry.tran: （旧时女子穿的长至膝部的）宽松内裤，灯笼衬裤
entry.def: Bloomers are an old-fashioned kind of women's underwear which consists of wide, loose trousers gathered at the knees.

means.word_mean: 1. (usually in the plural) underpants worn by women;
